citations.narrative:
*** The fox enclosure had insulation from the shelter area around the enclosure and next to the food bowl.
*** The pig enclosure had a soda can, broken rake head and trash items in the enclosure underneath the tarp area.
*** The chinchilla enclosure had building tools and supplies stored around the enclosure and on top of the enclosure.
Housekeeping for these areas needs to be addressed to keep the enclosures and premises around the enclosures clean
and in good repair for the safety of the animals.
Correct by: Aug 13, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
*** The fox enclosure had insulation from the shelter area around the enclosure and next to the food bowl. 
*** The pig enclosure had a soda can, broken rake head and trash items in the enclosure underneath the tarp area. 
*** The chinchilla enclosure had building tools and supplies stored around the enclosure and on top of the enclosure. 
Housekeeping for these areas needs to be addressed to keep the enclosures and premises around the enclosures clean 
and in good repair for the safety of the animals. 
 
Correct by: Aug 13, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
